explains: n. [农] 施肥；[胚] 受精；肥沃
wordGroup: in vitro fertilization 体外授精；试管内授精

sentences.en: From fertilization until birth is about 266 days.
sentences.cn: 从受精到出生大约是266天。

sentences.en: The sex of the embryo is predetermined at fertilization.
sentences.cn: 胚胎的性别早在受精时就决定了。

sentences.en: The sperm fuses with the egg to begin the process of fertilization.
sentences.cn: 精子与卵子结合开始受精过程。
